change_description:
This implementation class will be hidden in Lucene 5.0.
   UseAnalyzer.GLOBAL_REUSE_STRATEGYinstead!

This implementation class will be hidden in Lucene 5.0.
   UseAnalyzer.PER_FIELD_REUSE_STRATEGYinstead!

ImplementTermToBytesRefAttributeand store bytes directly
 instead. This class will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(4.0) This is only used to read indexes created
 before 4.0.
Only for reading old 4.0 and 4.1 segments
Only for reading old 4.0 and 4.1 segments
Only for reading old 4.0 and 4.1 segments
Only for reading old 4.0-4.5 segments, and supporting IndexWriter.addIndexes
This class is outdated and no longer used since Lucene 2.9. Nuke it finally!

This is here only to ease transition from
  the pre-4.0 APIs.

This is here only to ease transition from
  the pre-4.0 APIs.
This constant is no longer used since Lucene 4.5.
With Lucene 4.0, we are always on Java 6
With Lucene 4.8, we are always on Java 7
Bad naming of constant; useVersion.LUCENE_4_0_0instead (this constant actually points toVersion.LUCENE_4_0_0_ALPHAto match whole 4.0 series).
Bad naming of constant; useVersion.LUCENE_4_0_0instead (this constant actually points toVersion.LUCENE_4_0_0_ALPHAto match whole 4.0 series).
BytesRefshould not be used as a buffer, useBytesRefBuilderinstead
CharsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useCharsRefBuilderinstead
UseCodecUtil.checkFooter(org.apache.lucene.store.ChecksumIndexInput)instead, this should only used for files without checksums
To abort merges and then close, callIndexWriter.commit()and thenIndexWriter.rollback()instead.
BytesRefshould not be used as a buffer, useBytesRefBuilderinstead
CharsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useCharsRefBuilderinstead
BytesRefshould not be used as a buffer, useBytesRefBuilderinstead
CharsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useCharsRefBuilderinstead
IntsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useIntsRefBuilderinstead
This method will be removed in 5.0
(4.4) Index as a numeric field usingIntFieldand then useFieldCache.getInts(AtomicReader, String, boolean)instead.
(4.4) Index as a numeric field usingIntFieldand then useFieldCache.getInts(AtomicReader, String, boolean)instead.
This is no longer used since Lucene 4.5.
(4.4) Index as a numeric field usingIntFieldand then useFieldCache.getInts(AtomicReader, String, boolean)instead.
(4.4) Index as a numeric field usingIntFieldand then useFieldCache.getInts(AtomicReader, String, boolean)instead.

iterate fields and add their size() instead. 
   this method is only provided as a transition mechanism
   to access this statistic for 3.x indexes, which do not
   have this statistic per-field.
This comparator is only a transition mechanism
This comparator is only a transition mechanism
IntsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useIntsRefBuilderinstead
CharsRefshould not be used as a buffer, useCharsRefBuilderinstead
BytesRefshould not be used as a buffer, useBytesRefBuilderinstead

UseIndexOutput.getFilePointer()instead; this
 method will be removed in Lucene5.0.
This is no longer used since Lucene 4.5.

This is here only to ease transition from
 the pre-4.0 APIs.
This method is very dangerous and will be removed in Lucene 5.0

This will be removed in Lucene 5.x.  Interact withConcurrentMergeSchedulerif you really must know the specific
 timing of merges.
Don't create instances of this class, useAnalyzer.GLOBAL_REUSE_STRATEGY
Don't create instances of this class, useAnalyzer.PER_FIELD_REUSE_STRATEGY

UseAnalyzerWrapper.AnalyzerWrapper(Analyzer.ReuseStrategy)and specify a validAnalyzer.ReuseStrategy, probably retrieved from the
 wrapped analyzer usingAnalyzer.getReuseStrategy().

(3.1) UseStandardAnalyzerinstead, which has the same functionality.
 This analyzer will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(3.1) UseStopFilterinstead, which has the same functionality.
 This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(3.1) UseStandardTokenizerinstead, which has the same functionality.
 This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0
Use StandardTokenizer, CJKWidthFilter, CJKBigramFilter, and LowerCaseFilter instead.

UseCollationAttributeFactoryinstead, which encodes
  terms directly as bytes. This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(3.1) UseSnowballFilterwithDutchStemmerinstead, which has the
 same functionality. This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(3.1) UseDutchStemmerinstead, 
 which has the same functionality. This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

(3.1) UseSnowballFilterwithFrenchStemmerinstead, which has the
 same functionality. This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

UseFrenchStemmerinstead, 
 which has the same functionality. This filter will be removed in Lucene 4.0
(4.0) use the pattern-based analysis in the analysis/pattern package instead.

(4.4) PositionFilter makesTokenStreamgraphs inconsistent
             which can cause highlighting bugs. Its main use-case being to makeQueryParsergenerate boolean queries instead of phrase queries, it is now advised to useQueryParser.setAutoGeneratePhraseQueries(boolean)(for simple cases) or to overrideQueryParser.newFieldQuery.

(3.1) UseStandardTokenizerinstead, which has the same functionality.
 This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0

UseStandardTokenizerFactoryinstead.
  This tokenizer has no Russian-specific functionality.

(3.1) Use the language-specific analyzer in modules/analysis instead. 
 This analyzer will be removed in Lucene 5.0
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4
UseCollationKeyAnalyzer.CollationKeyAnalyzer(Version, Collator)and specify a version instead. This ctor will be removed in Lucene 5.0

change_id: 4.10.3_org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.CompoundWordTokenFilterBase(Version, TokenStream, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)
source_element_name: org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.CompoundWordTokenFilterBase(Version, TokenStream, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)

change_id: 4.10.3_org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.DictionaryCompoundWordTokenFilter(Version, TokenStream, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)
source_element_name: org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.DictionaryCompoundWordTokenFilter(Version, TokenStream, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)

change_description: ForVersion.LUCENE_4_3_0or below, useLucene43EdgeNGramTokenFilter, otherwise useEdgeNGramTokenFilter.EdgeNGramTokenFilter(TokenStream, int, int)
ForVersion.LUCENE_4_3_0or below, useLucene43EdgeNGramTokenFilter, otherwise useEdgeNGramTokenFilter.EdgeNGramTokenFilter(TokenStream, int, int)
ForVersion.LUCENE_4_3_0or below, useLucene43EdgeNGramTokenFilter, otherwise useEdgeNGramTokenFilter.EdgeNGramTokenFilter(TokenStream, int, int)
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4

change_id: 4.10.3_org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.HyphenationCompoundWordTokenFilter(Version, TokenStream, HyphenationTree, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)
source_element_name: org.apache.lucene.analysis.compound.HyphenationCompoundWordTokenFilter(Version, TokenStream, HyphenationTree, CharArraySet, int, int, int, boolean)

change_description: enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.
ForVersion.LUCENE_4_3_0and before, useLucene43NGramTokenizer, otherwise useNGramTokenizer.NGramTokenizer(AttributeFactory, Reader, int, int)
ForVersion.LUCENE_4_3_0and before, useLucene43NGramTokenizer, otherwise useNGramTokenizer.NGramTokenizer(Reader, int, int)
Offset updates are not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.

UseICUCollationAttributeFactoryinstead, which encodes
  terms directly as bytes. This filter will be removed in Lucene 5.0
UseICUCollationKeyAnalyzer.ICUCollationKeyAnalyzer(Version, Collator)and specify a version instead. This ctor will be removed in Lucene 5.0
enablePositionIncrements=false is not supported anymore as of Lucene 4.4.

This codec is read-only: as the functionality has been folded
 into the default codec. Its only for convenience to read old segments.
Only for reading old Appending segments

(March 2011) Not normally used, to be removed from Lucene 4.0.
   This class implementing Comparable is to be removed at the same time.

Index collation keys with CollationKeyAnalyzer or ICUCollationKeyAnalyzer instead.
 This class will be removed in Lucene 5.0

Index collation keys with CollationKeyAnalyzer or ICUCollationKeyAnalyzer instead.
 This class will be removed in Lucene 5.0

Index collation keys with CollationKeyAnalyzer or ICUCollationKeyAnalyzer instead.
 This class will be removed in Lucene 5.0

Index collation keys with CollationKeyAnalyzer or ICUCollationKeyAnalyzer instead.
  This class will be removed in Lucene 5.0
TODO remove; not used and not interesting, don't need collection in & out
Migrate to one of the newer suggesters which are much more RAM efficient.
Migrate to one of the newer suggesters which are much more RAM efficient.
